Detailed Description

Class for testing that two files are the same +/- some epsilon. Currently only supports tab separated matrixes of numerical data.

Definition at line 46 of file MatrixCheck.h.

unsigned int  allowedMisMatch 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Parameters:
generated - File created by application being tested.
gold - File believed to be "truth"
eps - Maximum absolute difference from truth acceptable.
rowSkip - Number of rows to skip before comparing.
colSkip - Number of columns to skip before comparing.
matchNames - Should we try to match the names using first column? Useful when the files aren't necessarily in same order.
allowedMisMatch - How many can we get wrong before failing?

Member Function Documentation

bool MatrixCheck::check ( std::string &  msg  )  [inline, virtual]

Check to make sure that two files are the same +/- some epsilon.

Parameters:
msg - Fills in an error message if test fails, empty string otherwise.
Returns:
- Returns true if files are close enough, false otherwise.

Implements RegressionCheck.
